pkgmetadata.longdescription: Bayesian Sparse Estimation of a Covariance Matrix // Provides functions which perform Bayesian estimations of a covariance matrix for multivariate normal data. Assumes that the covariance matrix is sparse or band matrix and positive- definite. This software has been developed using funding supported by Basic Science Research Program through the National Research Foundation of Korea ('NRF') funded by the Ministry of Education ('RS-2023-00211979', 'NRF-2022R1A5A7033499', 'NRF-2020R1A4A1018207' and 'NRF-2020R1C1C1A01013338').
